articles.title: NASA Plans to Give SpaceX Some Company on the Moon - The New York Times
articles.description: The agency will seek bids for future lunar landing spacecraft from companies other than SpaceX, which won the first contract to return American astronauts to the moon.
articles.content:
Still, NASA has been making progress.
